{"id":1113113549,"question_id":2,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1701802401,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"29 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1113113549/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"71.7 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        int carry = 0;\n       ListNode* dummy = new ListNode();\n       ListNode* temp = dummy;\n\n       while (l1 || l2  || carry) {\n           int digit_sum = 0;\n           if (l1) {\n               digit_sum += l1->val;\n               l1 = l1->next;\n           }\n           if (l2) {\n               digit_sum += l2->val;\n               l2 = l2->next;\n           }\n\n           digit_sum +=+ carry;\n           if (digit_sum >= 10) {\n               carry = 1;\n               digit_sum = digit_sum - 10;\n           }\n           else {\n               carry = 0;\n           }\n           ListNode* result = new ListNode(digit_sum);\n\n           temp->next = result;\n           temp = temp->next;\n       }\n\n       return dummy->next;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
